Name: Touhou Kimono Blast
About the game: Overview Touhou Kimono Blast is a strip 'em up shooting game. It was made and developed by an independently developed gentleman purely because of his interest. I hope you will enjoy it. Story A huge mysterious light shot out from the dark forest. The witch Hakurei Reimu who went to check was unfortunately shrunk by it. Facing huge monsters and barrage, can Hakurei Reimu have a way to defeat the monsters and solve the mystery? Gameplay Touhou Kimono Blast adheres to the traditional Touhou operation and gameplay, so that everyone can use the most familiar way to dodge the bullet while smashing the arrogant monsters that have emerged from all directions. Game Features Barrage Strip Shooting: In the face of arrogant monsters, you can use strip 'em up one by one. Let the monsters have nowhere to hide. The difficulty of being friendly to beginners: The game contains a variety of difficulty settings, even beginners who have not played barrage games can pass the level without pressure. Streamer friendly settings The game has the option of masking the private parts, so don't worry about it in the live. Continuously updated content With the development progress, new roles, new levels, and more interesting self-development systems will be added one after another. Hope you all like it.
